featured.text: Zoe was rather healthy when she was found, and once under the care of the orphanage she was very happy, consuming six gallons of vitamin-rich milk a day and earning a reputation as a confident, naughty and mischievous youngster.

definition.zh_def: 維生素，一種對人體健康必需的有機化合物，通常通過食物攝取。
definition.en_def: A vitamin is an organic compound that is essential for normal growth and nutrition, usually obtained through the diet.
definition.example: Vitamin C is important for maintaining a healthy immune system.
